dependencies.description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.
dependencies.name: py-cartopy

dependencies.description:
GeoPandas is an open source project to make working with geospatial data
in python easier. GeoPandas extends the datatypes used by pandas to
allow spatial operations on geometric types. Geometric operations are
performed by shapely. Geopandas further depends on fiona for file access
and descartes and matplotlib for plotting.
dependencies.name: py-geopandas

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Pooch manages your Python library's sample data files: it automatically
downloads and stores them in a local directory, with support for
versioning and corruption checks.
dependencies.name: py-pooch

dependencies.description:
Rasterio reads and writes geospatial raster data. Geographic information
systems use GeoTIFF and other formats to organize and store gridded, or
raster, datasets. Rasterio reads and writes these formats and provides a
Python API based on N-D arrays.
dependencies.name: py-rasterio

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: Manipulation and analysis of geometric objects in the Cartesian plane.
dependencies.name: py-shapely

dependencies.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python
dependencies.name: py-xarray

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description: Create masks of geospatial regions for arbitrary grids
name: py-regionmask

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
